heading: What health conditions, illnesses, disabilities or injuries do you have?
hint: You can add up to 12 conditions if you need to. You can add them in any order.

errors.required: Enter the name of your %s condition

conditionStartDate.label: When it first started
conditionStartDate.hint:
If you do not know the exact date, you can give an estimate.

For example, 30 3 1997

errors.required: Enter the date your %s condition started
errors.missingDay: Date your %s condition started must include a day
errors.missingMonth: Date your %s condition started must include a month
errors.missingYear: Date your %s condition started must include a year
errors.missingDayAndMonth: Date your %s condition started must include a day and a month
errors.missingDayAndYear: Date your %s condition started must include a day and a year
errors.missingMonthAndYear: Date your %s condition started must include a month and a year
errors.badFormatYear: Enter the date your %s condition started with a year in the right format, for example 2001 not 01
errors.notReal: Enter a real date for when your %s condition started
errors.notRealDigits: Enter a real date for when your %s condition started, using only digits
errors.inFuture: Date your %s condition started must be in the past
